modName: Disable Marriage for NPCs Batch  File
summary: Removes marriageable npc tag from males, soon females will come.
descriptionHtml:
I'm using Better Divine Blessings by lobotomy0 and Forgotten Magic Redone by 3JIou and sward66 so my amulet of Mara has worth and I'm using it because my restoration spells can deal damage to all enemies.
I'm a lonely person who has children. I don't want to be bumped with "are you interested in me?" So I made this file. This file contains all non-dlc npcs who can be marriageable ( males for now females will come)

Some may want some may not. If you didn't like than don't download like other mods.
Installation drop to your "C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrim"
It would be best to have legal version of game.
Just open console and write "Bat NoDLC"

BEWARE;This is NOT-reversible except another batch file which I won't release. (I guess)
author: Sompari
